name: Steel Castle
description:
Steel Castle is a side-scrolling adventure game with a moody atmosphere and environmental story-telling. The game features a defenseless protagonist who has to make his escape in a strange mixed world of sci-fi industrial and medieval elements.

Development Team:
Aino Kauranen
Kasimir Haapala
Rudi Rutanen
Tero Salmela

This game was made as a part of the Tampere University of Applied Sciences' Games Academy. (http://www.gamesacademy.fi/)
